chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
T0: Type

Goal:
forall (f : T -> T0 -> T) (x0 : T) (s : seq T0) (t : T0), foldl f x0 (rcons s t) = f (foldl f x0 s) t

Premises:
Notation seq := list
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
foldl = fun (T R : Type) (f : R -> T -> R) => fix foldl (z : R) (s : seq T) {struct s} : R := match s with | [::] => z | x :: s' => foldl (f z x) s' end : forall T R : Type, (R -> T -> R) -> R -> seq T -> R Arguments T, R are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
rcons = fun T : Type => fix rcons (s : seq T) (z : T) {struct s} : seq T := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end : forall T : Type, seq T -> T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope _]
foldr_rcons : forall (f : ?T0 -> ?T -> ?T) (x0 : ?T) (s : seq ?T0) (t : ?T0), foldr f x0 (rcons s t) = foldr f (f t x0) s where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type |- Type] ?T0 : [T : Type T0 : Type |- Type]
foldl_cat : forall (T R : Type) (f : R -> T -> R) (z : R) (s1 s2 : seq T), foldl f z (s1 ++ s2) = foldl f (foldl f z s1) s2
nth_mkseq : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (f : nat -> T) (n i : nat), ssrnat.leq (S i) n -> nth x0 (mkseq f n) i = f i
foldl_rev : forall (T R : Type) (f : R -> T -> R) (z : R) (s : seq T), foldl f z (rev s) = foldr (fun (x : T) (z0 : R) => f z0 x) z s
zip_rcons : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T) (x : S) (y : T), size s = size t -> zip (rcons s x) (rcons t y) = rcons (zip s t) (x, y)
List.fold_symmetric : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> A -> A), (forall x y z : A, f x (f y z) = f (f x y) z) -> forall a0 : A, (forall y : A, f a0 y = f y a0) -> forall l : seq A, List.fold_left f l a0 = List.fold_right f a0 l
nth_rev : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> nth x0 (rev s) n = nth x0 s (ssrnat.subn (size s) (S n))
nth_behead : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat), nth x0 (behead s) n = nth x0 s (S n)
nth_take : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (x0 : T) (i : nat), ssrnat.leq (S i) n0 -> forall s : seq T, nth x0 (take n0 s) i = nth x0 s i
nth_pairmap : forall (T1 : Type) (x1 : T1) (T2 : Type) (x2 : T2) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (n : nat), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> forall x : T1, nth x2 (pairmap f x s) n = f (nth x1 (x :: s) n) (nth x1 s n)
mkseq_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), mkseq (nth x0 s) (size s) = s
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
foldr_cat : forall (T2 R : Type) (f : T2 -> R -> R) (z0 : R) (s1 s2 : seq T2), foldr f z0 (s1 ++ s2) = foldr f (foldr f z0 s2) s1
List.fold_right_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> B) (l l' : seq A) (i : B), List.fold_right f i (l ++ l')%list = List.fold_right f (List.fold_right f i l') l
before_find : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (a : pred T) (s : seq T) (i : nat), ssrnat.leq (S i) (find a s) -> a (nth x0 s i) = false
nth0 : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s 0 = head x0 s
List.find_some : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : seq A) (x : A), List.find f l = Some x -> List.In x l /\ f x = true
map_rcons : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), [seq f i | i <- rcons s x] = rcons [seq f i | i <- s] (f x)
take_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> take (S n) s = rcons (take n s) (nth x0 s n)
nth_last : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s (Init.Nat.pred (size s)) = last x0 s
List.existsb_nth : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : seq A) (n : nat) (d : A), (n < length l)%nat -> List.existsb f l = false -> f (List.nth n l d) = false
size_mkseq : forall (T : Type) (f : nat -> T) (n : nat), size (mkseq f n) = n
ssrfun.can_inj : forall (rT aT : Type) (f : aT -> rT) (g : rT -> aT), ssrfun.cancel f g -> ssrfun.injective f
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
List.filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l : seq A), List.In x (List.filter f l) < -> List.In x l /\ f x = true

```coq
intros f x0 s t.
rewrite <- foldl_cat.
rewrite <- foldl_rev.
rewrite foldr_rcons.
reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros f x0 s t. rewrite <- foldl_cat. rewrite <- foldl_rev. rewrite foldr_rcons. reflexivity.
